title: PMD refutes issuing statement on protesting public servants' salary cut
body_lines: President's Media Division today refuted the notice circulating on Facebook that the May 2022 salaries of public servants participating in the Hartal campaign will be cut.

The PMD said in a statement that a notice circulating on Facebook using the President's Media Division's letterhead that the May 2022 salaries of public servants participating in the Hartal campaign will be cut is completely false.

The Presidential Secretariat has not made such a notification to the Ministry of Public Administration and the relevant authorities have already commenced investigations into this fabricated news, the PMD said
